definition: Xinhua Bookstore, China's largest bookstore chain
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: We went to the Xinhua Bookstore to buy books at two o'clock in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午两点我们去新华书店去买书。

sentences.english: He bough a book on basketball tactics from the Xinghua book-store yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天他在新华书店买了一本《篮球战术》。

sentences.english: On the cultivation of the consciousness of basketball in its drills of techniques and tactics;
sentences.chinese: 昨天他在新华书店买了一本《篮球战术》。

sentences.english: It's directly opposite the Xinhua Bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 就在新华书店的正对面。

sentences.english: I turn toward right from the store after the New China Bookstore arrive at the Zhongshan Park .
sentences.chinese: 我从商店向右拐经过新华书店到达中山公园。

sentences.english: Don't you know (that) Jim lives next to Xinhua Bookshop?
sentences.chinese: 难道你不知道吉姆住在新华书店的隔壁吗？

sentences.english: I took candles to the Xinhua bookstore on Zhongshan Rd . so I could look for books when the power failed.
sentences.chinese: 我到中山路的新华书店都自带蜡烛，以备断电后使用。

sentences.english: I saw it yesterday at the Xin Hua bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天在新华书店看到这本书了。

sentences.english: I buy this book from Xinhua Bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 我从新华书店买的这本书。

sentences.english: He bought a book on basketball tactics from the Xinghua book-store yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 明天他在新华书店买了一本《篮球战术》。

sentences.english: So I'm going to Xinhua Bookstore to buy a new comic book in the after-noon.
sentences.chinese: 因此下午，我打算去新华书店买一本新漫画书。

sentences.english: Please send a taxi to the Xinghua Bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 请派一辆出租汽车到新华书店。

sentences.english: Can you tell me where Xinhua bookstore is?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我新华书店在哪里吗？

definition: Joint Publishing, bookstore chain and publisher, founded in Hong Kong in 1948
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
retail department/section of a retail store
